articles.title: Watch: Jack Hughes delivers USA first Olympic gold medal in men’s hockey since 1980, team honors Johnny Gaudreau
articles.description:
Team USA defeated Canada, 2-1, in Sunday's gold medal game.

The post Watch: Jack Hughes delivers USA first Olympic gold medal in men’s hockey since 1980, team honors Johnny Gaudreau appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Team USA won Olympic gold in men's hockey, defeating Canada 2-1 on February 22, 2026.
Jack Hughes scored the winning goal, marking the first gold since 1980.
The victory boosts local pride and inspires future hockey talent in Boston.
